parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it's a factor to consider.  The lack of a CMF suggests it might not be officially sanctioned campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "REPER," which is a political party participating in the parliamentary elections.  This directly satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post, being a paid Facebook advertisement, is clearly intended to reach a wide audience beyond personal communication.  The targeting parameters (age, location) further support this. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The phrase "Dâmbovița votează REPER pe 1 decembrie!" ("Dâmbovița votes REPER on December 1st!") has a clear electoral objective: to encourage voters in Dâmbovița County to vote for the REPER party. This directly satisfies Article 36 (7) - c. The timing (close to election day) strengthens this interpretation.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It's a straightforward call to action, not an informative or analytical piece. It does not provide news, analysis, or opinions on political events.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>486555060504441</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific political party (REPER) participating in the elections, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support REPER. The timing of the post, close to election day, further strengthens the case.  The lack of a CMF number is a mitigating factor, but not sufficient to overturn the conclusion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>REPER</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[REPER Dâmbovița], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu mesajul "Dâmbovița votează REPER pe 1 decembrie!", care îndeamnă direct la vot pentru Partidul REPER, având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea acestuia, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.  Postarea cu ID-ul 486555060504441 este o dovadă clară a încălcării legislației.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
